Reference

Summary

Summary of the package

optimalppp

optimalppp

Data

Data sets distributed with the package

sim_project_data sim_project_data sim_tree

Simulated project and phylogenetic data

Solution methods

Functions for generating solutions

ppp_gurobi_solution()

Solve the 'Project Prioritization Protocol' problem using Gurobi

ppp_heuristic_solution()

Solve the 'Project Prioritization Protocol' problem using heuristic algorithms

ppp_manual_solution()

Solve the 'Project Prioritization Protocol' problem by manually specifying a solution

ppp_random_solution()

Random solutions for the 'Project Prioritization Protocol' problem

Miscellaneous

Miscellaneous functions

branch_matrix()

Branch matrix

ppp_plot()

Plot a 'Project Prioritization Protocol' solution

ppp_simulate_data()

Simulate conservation project data
